TopicTitle: Is there a way to rebind the "Focus Next/Prev" in map view key (default TAB & Shift+TAB)

Articles.Content:
As the title says.  It seems that the Next/Prev function that's assigned to the TAB key can't be changed (maybe the ONLY key that can't be changed).

Or

Am I blind?  (A real possibility even tho I went over the key binds pages over and over again)

If you know where it can be altered, a screenshot would be AWESOME!  Extra credit for circles and arrows!

TIA.

24 minutes ago, tg626 said:

It seems that the Next/Prev function that's assigned to the TAB key can't be changed (maybe the ONLY key that can't be changed).

Since 1.2.2 those bindings were changed to the square braces/brackets. And ~ is to reset focus (changed from Backsapce which now triggers the Abort action group).

Edited December 22, 2017 by JadeOfMaar
Check the settings.cfg file, lot's of binds in there you can change that aren't in the in game settings menu.

22 hours ago, Rocket In My Pocket said:

Check the settings.cfg file, lot's of binds in there you can change that aren't in the in game settings menu.

wow, so there are:

FOCUS_NEXT_VESSEL
{
    primary = RightBracket
    secondary = None
    group = 0
    modeMask = -1
    modeMaskSec = -1
}
FOCUS_PREV_VESSEL
{
    primary = LeftBracket
    secondary = None
    group = 0
    modeMask = -1
    modeMaskSec = -1
}

I never knew that, thanks
